sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with wan zhe 踠折 , fracture . Kai bao xin xiang ding ben cao 開 寶 新 詳 定 本 草 Kai bao chong ding ben cao 開寶重定本草 Substance Entry ye tuo zhi 野駝脂： 主頑痹風瘙，惡瘡毒腫死肌，筋皮攣縮，踠損筋骨 , “It controls stubborn blockage and wind itching, malign sores, poison swelling, and dead muscles, as well as sinew and skin contractions, and fracture injury of the sinews and bones”.
